Topic.Title: Importing Game From PC To Browser Editor

Posts.EditableText: Is it possible to important a game from the PC version of Quest to the in-browser version of the editor?  If so, how?
Posts.HTML: Is it possible to important a game from the PC version of Quest to the in-browser version of the editor?  If so, how?

Posts.EditableText: It is not something you or I can do. It might be possible for Alex to do, but I am not even sure about that.
Posts.HTML: It is not something you or I can do. It might be possible for Alex to do, but I am not even sure about that.
